00038 // wait time for suspend().  This is not the most elegant way of implementing suspend, but
00039 // it is the most efficient.  It is unlikely that the user will leave the program running for
00040 // more than 31.688 years.
00041 #define BS_SUSPEND_FOREVER_TIME                 999999999
